ui.js

Summary
ui.js
UISingleton top-level UI manager.
Constants and Variables
DBLCLICK_INTERVALDefines the maximum time (in ms) between two clicks for it to count as a double click.
DBLCLICK_OFFSETDefines the maximum offset (in pixels) between two clicks for it to count as a double click.
_frameInitializedTrue if the Tab View UI frame has been initialized.
_pageBoundsStores the page bounds.
_closedLastVisibleTabIf true, the last visible tab has just been closed in the tab strip.
_closedSelectedTabInTabViewIf true, a select tab has just been closed in TabView.
restoredClosedTabIf true, a closed tab has just been restored.
_reorderTabItemsOnShowKeeps track of the GroupItems which their tab items’ tabs have been moved and re-orders the tab items when switching to TabView.
_reorderTabsOnHideKeeps track of the GroupItems which their tab items have been moved in TabView UI and re-orders the tabs when switcing back to main browser.
_currentTabKeeps track of which xul:tab we are currently on.
_lastClickKeeps track of the time of last click event to detect double click.
_eventListenersKeeps track of event listeners added to the AllTabs object.
_cleanupFunctionsAn array of functions to be called at uninit time
_maxInteractiveWaitIf the UI is in the middle of an operation, this is the max amount of milliseconds to wait between input events before we no longer consider the operation interactive.
_privateBrowsing
_storageBusyCountUsed to keep track of how many calls to storageBusy vs storageReady.
Functions and Properties
initMust be called after the object is created.
rtlReturns true if we are in RTL mode, false otherwise
resetResets the Panorama view to have just one group with all tabs and, if firstTime == true, add the welcome video/tab
blurAllBlurs any currently focused element
isIdleReturns true if the last interaction was long enough ago to consider the UI idle.
getActiveTabReturns the currently active tab as a TabItem
setActiveTabSets the currently active tab.
isTabViewVisibleReturns true if the TabView UI is currently shown.
_initPageDirectionInitializes the page base direction
showTabViewShows TabView and hides the main browser UI.
hideTabViewHides TabView and shows the main browser UI.
_setActiveTitleColorUsed on the Mac to make the title bar match the gradient in the rest of the TabView UI.
storageBusyPauses the storage activity that conflicts with sessionstore updates and private browsing mode switches.
storageReadyResumes the activity paused by storageBusy, and updates for any new group information in sessionstore.
_addTabActionHandlersAdds handlers to handle tab actions.
_removeTabActionHandlersRemoves handlers to handle tab actions.
goToTabSelects the given xul:tab in the browser.
onTabSelectCalled when the user switches from one tab to another outside of the TabView UI.
setReorderTabsOnHideSets the groupItem which the tab items’ tabs should be re-ordered when switching to the main browser UI.
setReorderTabItemsOnShowSets the groupItem which the tab items should be re-ordered when switching to the tab view UI.
getClosestTabConvenience function to get the next tab closest to the entered position
_setTabViewFrameKeyHandlersSets up the key handlers for navigating between tabs within the TabView UI.
enableSearchEnables the search feature.
_createGroupItemOnDragCalled in response to a mousedown in empty space in the TabView UI; creates a new groupItem based on the user’s drag.
_resizeUpdate the TabView UI contents in response to a window size change.
exitExits TabView UI.
storageSanityGiven storage data for this object, returns true if it looks valid.
_saveSaves the data for this object to persistent storage
_saveAllSaves all data associated with TabView.

UI

Singleton top-level UI manager.

Summary
Constants and Variables
DBLCLICK_INTERVALDefines the maximum time (in ms) between two clicks for it to count as a double click.
DBLCLICK_OFFSETDefines the maximum offset (in pixels) between two clicks for it to count as a double click.
_frameInitializedTrue if the Tab View UI frame has been initialized.
_pageBoundsStores the page bounds.
_closedLastVisibleTabIf true, the last visible tab has just been closed in the tab strip.
_closedSelectedTabInTabViewIf true, a select tab has just been closed in TabView.
restoredClosedTabIf true, a closed tab has just been restored.
_reorderTabItemsOnShowKeeps track of the GroupItems which their tab items’ tabs have been moved and re-orders the tab items when switching to TabView.
_reorderTabsOnHideKeeps track of the GroupItems which their tab items have been moved in TabView UI and re-orders the tabs when switcing back to main browser.
_currentTabKeeps track of which xul:tab we are currently on.
_lastClickKeeps track of the time of last click event to detect double click.
_eventListenersKeeps track of event listeners added to the AllTabs object.
_cleanupFunctionsAn array of functions to be called at uninit time
_maxInteractiveWaitIf the UI is in the middle of an operation, this is the max amount of milliseconds to wait between input events before we no longer consider the operation interactive.
_privateBrowsing
_storageBusyCountUsed to keep track of how many calls to storageBusy vs storageReady.

initMust be called after the object is created.
rtlReturns true if we are in RTL mode, false otherwise
resetResets the Panorama view to have just one group with all tabs and, if firstTime == true, add the welcome video/tab
blurAllBlurs any currently focused element
isIdleReturns true if the last interaction was long enough ago to consider the UI idle.

setActiveTabSets the currently active tab.

hideTabViewHides TabView and shows the main browser UI.

storageReadyResumes the activity paused by storageBusy, and updates for any new group information in sessionstore.
_addTabActionHandlersAdds handlers to handle tab actions.
_removeTabActionHandlersRemoves handlers to handle tab actions.
goToTabSelects the given xul:tab in the browser.
onTabSelectCalled when the user switches from one tab to another outside of the TabView UI.
setReorderTabsOnHideSets the groupItem which the tab items’ tabs should be re-ordered when switching to the main browser UI.
setReorderTabItemsOnShowSets the groupItem which the tab items should be re-ordered when switching to the tab view UI.

_setTabViewFrameKeyHandlersSets up the key handlers for navigating between tabs within the TabView UI.
enableSearchEnables the search feature.
_createGroupItemOnDragCalled in response to a mousedown in empty space in the TabView UI; creates a new groupItem based on the user’s drag.
_resizeUpdate the TabView UI contents in response to a window size change.
exitExits TabView UI.
storageSanityGiven storage data for this object, returns true if it looks valid.
_saveSaves the data for this object to persistent storage
_saveAllSaves all data associated with TabView.

Constants and Variables

DBLCLICK_INTERVAL

Defines the maximum time (in ms) between two clicks for it to count as a double click.

DBLCLICK_OFFSET

Defines the maximum offset (in pixels) between two clicks for it to count as a double click.

_frameInitialized

True if the Tab View UI frame has been initialized.

_pageBounds

Stores the page bounds.

_closedLastVisibleTab

If true, the last visible tab has just been closed in the tab strip.

_closedSelectedTabInTabView

If true, a select tab has just been closed in TabView.

restoredClosedTab

If true, a closed tab has just been restored.

_reorderTabItemsOnShow

Keeps track of the GroupItems which their tab items’ tabs have been moved and re-orders the tab items when switching to TabView.

_reorderTabsOnHide

Keeps track of the GroupItems which their tab items have been moved in TabView UI and re-orders the tabs when switcing back to main browser.

_currentTab

Keeps track of which xul:tab we are currently on.  Used to facilitate zooming down from a previous tab.

_lastClick

Keeps track of the time of last click event to detect double click.  Used to create tabs on double-click since we cannot attach ‘dblclick’

_eventListeners

Keeps track of event listeners added to the AllTabs object.

_cleanupFunctions

An array of functions to be called at uninit time

_maxInteractiveWait

If the UI is in the middle of an operation, this is the max amount of milliseconds to wait between input events before we no longer consider the operation interactive.

_privateBrowsing

Keeps track of info related to private browsing, including

transitionModewhether we’re entering or exiting PB
wasInTabViewwhether TabView was visible before we went into PB

_storageBusyCount

Used to keep track of how many calls to storageBusy vs storageReady.

Functions and Properties

init

init: function UI_init()

Must be called after the object is created.

rtl

Returns true if we are in RTL mode, false otherwise

reset

reset: function UI_reset(firstTime)

Resets the Panorama view to have just one group with all tabs and, if firstTime == true, add the welcome video/tab

blurAll

blurAll: function UI_blurAll()

Blurs any currently focused element

isIdle

isIdle: function UI_isIdle()

Returns true if the last interaction was long enough ago to consider the UI idle.  Used to determine whether interactivity would be sacrificed if the CPU was to become busy.

getActiveTab

getActiveTab: function UI_getActiveTab()

Returns the currently active tab as a TabItem

setActiveTab

setActiveTab: function UI_setActiveTab(tabItem)

Sets the currently active tab.  The idea of a focused tab is useful for keyboard navigation and returning to the last zoomed-in tab.  Hitting return/esc brings you to the focused tab, and using the arrow keys lets you navigate between open tabs.

Parameters

  • Takes a TabItem

isTabViewVisible

isTabViewVisible: function UI_isTabViewVisible()

Returns true if the TabView UI is currently shown.

_initPageDirection

_initPageDirection: function UI__initPageDirection()

Initializes the page base direction

showTabView

showTabView: function UI_showTabView(zoomOut)

Shows TabView and hides the main browser UI.  Parameters: zoomOut - true for zoom out animation, false for nothing.

hideTabView

hideTabView: function UI_hideTabView()

Hides TabView and shows the main browser UI.

_setActiveTitleColor

_setActiveTitleColor: function UI__setActiveTitleColor(set)

Used on the Mac to make the title bar match the gradient in the rest of the TabView UI.

Parameters

settrue for the special TabView color, false for the normal color.

storageBusy

storageBusy: function UI_storageBusy()

Pauses the storage activity that conflicts with sessionstore updates and private browsing mode switches.  Calls can be nested.

storageReady

storageReady: function UI_storageReady()

Resumes the activity paused by storageBusy, and updates for any new group information in sessionstore.  Calls can be nested.

_addTabActionHandlers

_addTabActionHandlers: function UI__addTabActionHandlers()

Adds handlers to handle tab actions.

_removeTabActionHandlers

_removeTabActionHandlers: function UI__removeTabActionHandlers()

Removes handlers to handle tab actions.

goToTab

goToTab: function UI_goToTab(xulTab)

Selects the given xul:tab in the browser.

onTabSelect

onTabSelect: function UI_onTabSelect(tab)

Called when the user switches from one tab to another outside of the TabView UI.

setReorderTabsOnHide

setReorderTabsOnHide: function UI_setReorderTabsOnHide(groupItem)

Sets the groupItem which the tab items’ tabs should be re-ordered when switching to the main browser UI.  Parameters: groupItem - the groupItem which would be used for re-ordering tabs.

setReorderTabItemsOnShow

setReorderTabItemsOnShow: function UI_setReorderTabItemsOnShow(groupItem)

Sets the groupItem which the tab items should be re-ordered when switching to the tab view UI.  Parameters: groupItem - the groupItem which would be used for re-ordering tab items.

getClosestTab

getClosestTab: function UI_getClosestTab(tabCenter)

Convenience function to get the next tab closest to the entered position

_setTabViewFrameKeyHandlers

_setTabViewFrameKeyHandlers: function UI__setTabViewFrameKeyHandlers()

Sets up the key handlers for navigating between tabs within the TabView UI.

enableSearch

enableSearch: function UI_enableSearch(event)

Enables the search feature.  Parameters: event - the event triggers this action.

_createGroupItemOnDrag

_createGroupItemOnDrag: function UI__createGroupItemOnDrag(e)

Called in response to a mousedown in empty space in the TabView UI; creates a new groupItem based on the user’s drag.

_resize

_resize: function UI__resize(force)

Update the TabView UI contents in response to a window size change.  Won’t do anything if it doesn’t deem the resize necessary.  Parameters: force - true to update even when “unnecessary”; default false

exit

exit: function UI_exit()

Exits TabView UI.

storageSanity

_storageSanity: function UI__storageSanity(data)

Given storage data for this object, returns true if it looks valid.

_save

_save: function UI__save()

Saves the data for this object to persistent storage

_saveAll

_saveAll: function UI__saveAll()

Saves all data associated with TabView.  TODO: Save info items
